name: Locked and Loaded Die
description:
Survive against hordes of aliens with your ever changing arsenal of weapons.

This project is our submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 following the theme of "Roll of the Dice."

Locked and Loaded Die follows the theme of Roll of the Dice as the player must face 3 rolling dice that determines their weapon every 10 seconds. 

Move left and right with A and D. Space to Jump, Aim with Mouse and left click to shoot.

This game was made by Alex G. Christopher G. Isabella K. Janista G. Kien N. Laurence G. Lorenzo C. Melvin G.

You can play in browser or download

Assets Used:

Health Bar Art by Brackeys
